title: 怎么设置主城世界天不黑
author: 国产盒子精

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doDaylightCycle false
/gamerule doWeatherCycle false

站在主城输即可
